content:
It seems that in the version of firmware or software that you are running, the location of the DNS settings may have changed or the option may have a different name, In the version of MediaAccess TG789vac v2 that you have, the option may be located under a different menu.

Try looking under "Local Network" or "Internet Access" menus for options related to DNS settings or IP address configuration.

If you are unable to find the option, you can also try searching for keywords like "DNS" or "IP" in the router's web interface to locate the settings.

If you are still unable to locate the option, it is recommended to refer to the router's documentation or contact the manufacturer for more information on how to configure the DNS settings on this specific router model.
